title: List of tallest buildings in Denver
summary: The tallest building in Denver is the 56-story Republic Plaza, which rises 717 feet (219 m) and was completed in 1984.[1] It stands as the 137th-tallest building in the United States, and the tallest building in the state of Colorado. The second-tallest skyscraper in the city and the state is 1801 California Street, which rises 709 feet (216 m).[2] Twenty-nine of the thirty tallest buildings in Colorado are located in Denver.[3]
